snippet.title: Temple of Apshai - C64 - Best Dungeon Games (Epyx 1983)
snippet.description:
Temple of Apshai - C64, one of the best dungeon games of the classic era of computing. You can dare to explore and read, watch, listen and play the history of computer games at my video game history website The Dot Eaters: https://thedoteaters.com

Temple of Apshai is also one of the best games on the C64. Part of game designer Jon Freeman's Dujunquest games. Thou art frugal!

Dare to explore the history of Epyx, at The Dot Eaters:
http://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=epyx

Facebook 🕹️ https://www.facebook.com/thedoteaters
Twitter 🕹️  https://twitter.com/doteaters
YouTube 🕹️ https://www.youtube.com/user/Umma6umma
Pinterest 🕹️ https://www.pinterest.com/thedoteaters/

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
